item.title: Convert Seurat to Scanpy h5ad
item.author: Author
item.description: IMPORTANT UPDDATE: 2023-02-21 MuDataSeurat Recommended!!! MuDataSeurat write h5ad file directly. easy install and simple use Refer to MuDataSeurat Install The main repo seem not updated anymore. So, please Install my fork which works for anndata >=0.8 1 2 3 # in R console ## install the dev branch, which compatible with latest anndata remotes::install_github("zqfang/MuDataSeurat", ref='dev', force = T) Usage (Optional) Step 1: Slim down a Seurat object.
